trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There were no other sightings in San Francisco on or around January 31st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsA red object appeared in the sky northwest of the city. It looked almost like it was on fire but you could see lights underneath. It stayed hovering in one spot and began dropping red "lights" down to earth. After it stopped dropping lights it stayed there for another minute or so then just vanished.
